args: Something terrifying is happening.\nSomething in me is out of control.\nOh, my savior!
Help me, my savior! Help me!\nWhy must I suffer like this?\nWas my birth a crime?!
Thanks for telling me all this, Lathna.\nLet me make sure I follow...
First, the black cat you found died,\nfollowed by yet another stray cat.\nAfter that, humans started to die as well.
And you're convinced this is all somehow\nyour fault. Am I with you so far?
It's true. It has to be.
I keep having dreams where the me\nwho isn't me does...terrible things.
I strangled them! Cats and humans both!\nI strangled them all!

But you COULDN'T have done this, Lathna.
I saw the finger marks the killer left on
the latest corpse—they were far too large
for a child to have made them.
Then how do you explain my dreams?
Look, I'll tell you what you want to know,\nso just...leave me alone.
You're here looking for heretics, right?\nWell, I know where they are.
Most of the villagers have served me\ndinner at one point or another.
A lot of them got angry with me because\nI forgot to pray to Ilia before eating.
But some of them DIDN'T get angry.\nIn fact, they said prayers I was much\nmore familiar with.
Such as a prayer you might have said\nback in Hethiwood?
Yeah. The old lady and man I killed were\ntwo of them.

So both the murder victims were heretics?
Interesting. I wonder if they were killed to
ensure their silence, or if there was some
other reason currently at play here...
Well done, Lathna. Now I might actually\nbe able to clear your name.
You just relax and have a good night's\nsleep. Don't worry—I'll be right here.
So you really are the Ancient One's\nmessenger.
I heard of you from Father. Was...was he\nable to reach the Ancient One?
The peak cannot be seen from the foot.\nAll who seek truth must navigate the void.
Then take me to the Ancient One's feast!\nI would know everything! EVERYTHING!

Your soul, a bubble in Our hand.
Your life, a floret betwixt Our fists.
You yearn for the feast long abhorred
by mortal souls. You ache. Burn.
D-did I fall asleep?!\n...No, I remember now.\nLast night, the world suddenly went dark...
Lathna? LATHNA! ...Okay, where did\nshe get off to now?
Wait, is this a letter? ...Oh, damn it all!
Where is she? WHERE IS SHE?!
Tell me where that demon is!

Don't even THINK of trying to hide her!
Wasn't my husband enough for her?!
Did she have to take my daughter, too?!
I'll never forgive her! NEVER!

Just last night! First this woman's husband
was murdered, and now her daughter!
I thought you were supposed to be
watching over that killer, inquisitor.
How long do you intend to let that heretic\nremain in our good village?!
Oh, if you wanted to be rid of her,\nyour wish has been granted.
I awoke this morning to find a letter.\nHere. Read it for yourself.
I don't want to cause any more trouble\nfor everyone, so I'm going somewhere\nwhere I won't bother people ever again.
But make no mistake—my hunt for\nheretics in this village is not over.
So you had all better pray that girl is\nsafe—because if she isn't, I am going\nto fall VERY hard on all of you.
...Come on, Lathna. Please be all right.\nDon't do anything foolish!
